Create a custom cardboard box with your branding and logo on it to showcase your products or services at trade shows or events.
Use a cardboard box as a creative storage solution for your office supplies or home decor items.
Cut out a hole in a cardboard box to create a mini greenhouse for plants, making it a unique and eco-friendly way to grow herbs or flowers in your office or home.
Use a cardboard box as a base for a DIY plant holder or planter, adding soil and your favorite plants to create a miniature garden.
Use a cardboard box as a makeshift desk organizer, by cutting out compartments and labeling them to keep your office supplies or home decor items neat and tidy.
